loans.use: to buy more stocks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Sirun

texts.en:
Sirun is 41 years old and lives in the village Gandzakar in the Tavush region. Sirun is already skilled and a very clever farmer. Despite of having the specialty of an accountant, she never worked in that field and during the last 20 years she has become a perfect farmer. She is especially good in poultry and pig breeding. 

On her farm she has 5 pigs and 10 piglets, as well as 30 chickens. Her fruit garden is also a great place to admire since it is full of tasty and colourful fruits such as apples, pears, peaches, plums, and mulberry. She sells all these harvests and also eggs at the city wholesale market. Sirun has serious plans to start the sale of piglets from her farm, which will surely be profitable for her family.

Sirun is married and she has a daughter (she is a student) and a school-aged son. Her husband now works in Yerevan city (he is a constructor) and from time to time he returns to his village both to see his family and to bring money for his family needs.

Sirun asks for this loan since she wants to buy a large lot of animal fodder for her pigs and piglets, which she wants to grow and make fatter for future sale.

loans.use: to buy large lot of animal fodder for her pigs and piglets.

loans.name: Naheed

texts.en: Naheed is 37 years old and a dedicated mother of six children. She is always supportive of her family. Her husband is a taxi driver. He has been driving a taxi for more than 15 years. The main source of their income comes from driving the taxi. As they have a big family, it is very difficult for them to meet their daily expenses.  Due to regular driving, the taxi needs to be repaired so that it drives smoothly. As the entire family depends on this single source of income, its proper maintenance is very necessary. Their current income is not sufficient enough to help them pay for the maintenance charges of the taxi. Therefore, Naheed has applied for a loan from BRAC Pakistan, a Kiva partner. She is thankful to BRAC Pakistan and Kiva for helping her with the loan.

loans.use: to help repair her husband's taxi.

loans.name: Sidra

texts.en:
Sidra is 42 years old and lives with her three children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan.  Her husband is a motorcycle mechanic by profession. He repairs and troubleshoots the vehicles. He has been doing this business for many years and provides his services near his hometown. Mostly people who have vehicles like to have him repair their vehicles. He has been running this business for many years and has been using very expensive tools for repairs which have gotten too worn. He wants to replace these tools with new ones, but he does not have money to buy new tools. 

Therefore, Sidra has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan so that her husband will be able to buy new repair tools and some spare parts for repairing motorcycles. Sidra thanks Kiva and its field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy tools and spare parts for her husband.

loans.name: Haya

texts.en: Haya is a 29-year-old separated woman living in Tafila, Jordan. She started her own business four years ago, sewing clothes and fabric at her house and selling them to people in her area  to support herself. Her mother is helping her in marketing her products, and she is planning to expand her business in the future. Now she needs to raise her productivity by buying more raw materials that she needs to sew more clothes, but she doesn't have enough money to do so. For that reason, she has applied for this youth loan.

loans.use: to buy more raw materials that she needs to sew more clothes

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente de 26 años de edad vive con su esposa y sus hijos en casa propia la cual ha sido heredada por el padre, él se dedica a la reparación y venta de llantas usadas, ya tiene dos años de poseer el negocio y lo tiene ubicado cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar las necesidades que se le presentan en su hogar, el cliente solicita un crédito para la compra de llantas por mayor para su negocio y poder darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
The client is 26 years old and lives with his wife and children in their own house, which he inherited from his father.  He works in the repair and sale of used tires.  He already has had the business for two years and it is located close to his home.  With what he makes from his work, he is able to pay for the necessities that present themselves in his home.

He is requesting a loan in order to purchase wholesale tires for his business and be able to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale tires to sell

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es: Ricardo de 54 años de edad vive con su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos, el cliente tiene diez años  de dedicarse al cultivo de güisquil y ayote mejorando sus ingresos con el paso del tiempo, el terreno lo tiene ubicado cerca de su lugar de residencia, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, con lo que vende logra solventar las necesidades de su hogar, Ricardo solicita un crédito para mejorar el terreno donde siembra el güisquil  y asi poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Ricardo is 54 years old. He lives with his life partner and his two children. For ten years this client has been cultivating chayote and pumpkins, improving his earnings as time goes on. His land is near his home. He sells his products in the different markets near his house, and with what he sells he is able to take care of his household needs. Ricardo is asking for a loan to improve the land where he plants chayote and pumpkins. This way he will be able to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to improve the land where he plants chayote.

loans.name: Villa Pumacahua Group

texts.es: Lourdes de 37 años de edad es separada con 03 hijos dependientes. Este es el grupo “Villa Pumacahua” La cual  está conformado por 08 socios responsables y emprendedores. Lourdes se dedica  al cuidado y limpieza de una casa de retiro. Tiene pensado poner un negocio propio ya que le permite su desarrollo.  Solicitó el crédito para la compra Útiles de limpieza como escoba, recogedor de basura y trapeador. El grupo “Villa Pumacahua” agradece a todas las personas que facilitaron este crédito. Lourdes es la tercera del lado izquierdo y viste chaleco negro.
texts.en: Lourdes is 37 years old. She is separated and has 3 dependents. This is the “Villa Pumacahua”, which is made up of 8 responsible and entrepreneurial members. Lourdes works caring and cleaning in a retirement home. She is planning on opening her own business because this will allow her to develop. She asked for the loan to buy cleaning supplies such as a broom, a dust pan and a mop. The “Villa Pumacahua” thanks all of the people who facilitated this loan. Lourdes is third from the left and wearing a black vest.

loans.use: to buy cleaning supplies such as a broom, a dust pan and a mop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy trousers, blouses, underwear, products for costume jewelry and cosmetics.

loans.name: Sokheng

texts.en:
Sokheng is 30 years old and a mother of one child. She lives in a small village of Kompong Cham Province, Cambodia. She is a grocery seller at her house. So far, she has been involved in this business for two years with a net profit around USD $10 per day.

Sokheng wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family by having a latrine to use because there is no latrine in her house now. Therefore, she is borrowing from Kiva to build a latrine and buy its fixtures. By doing this, she can help her family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and help to lessen environmental deterioration. She is thankful for the loan granted through HKL with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to build a latrine

loans.name: Mich

texts.en:
From Prey Chhor District, Kampong Cham Province, Mich, 45, is an experienced and active farmer. At home, she is a lovely mother of two married children and three dependent children who are enrolled in a local school. By operating a farming business on a small cassava plantation, she can earn around 5.00 USD a day to support her family's daily expenses. So far, she has been involving in this career for fifteen years.

To keep her cassava growing well with more yield, Mich is going to use natural fertilizers on her farmland. Due to the shortage of money, she would like to get a Kiva loan via KHL to buy fertilizers to use in her farming process this season. With the support from this loan, she hopes that she can make her cassava grow better and provide more benefit to her.  

She thanks all the lenders for their generous behaviour.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her cassava plantation.

loans.name: Shoira

texts.en: Shoira was born in 1982. She is careful mother of three children. Her children are little. Shoira’s husband is a hair maker. He works in a salon. Shoira has been busy with growing and selling agriculture products. She grows mainly vegetables. Shoira sells vegetables in a local market. There is a great demand for vegetables in a local market, because people use fresh vegetables every day. Shoira’s elder child goes to school. She must buy a school uniform and school supplies for her child. She is asking for a loan of 5,000 TJS with this aim. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to buy a school uniform and school supplies for her child.

loans.name: Dina

texts.en: Dina is a 22-year-old lady living in Dairalla, Jordan. She has been selling blankets for one year. Her business started with selling small amounts of them to her friends. Later on, she built up a good customer base and she raised her sales. Now she is seeking a youth loan to buy more blankets and to add the sale of clothing to her business, as her customers have requested.

loans.use: to buy more blankets and to add the sale of clothing

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
HELLO! Meet Rose, a mother of one lovely daughter who is 8 years. Rose is based in Tambalal, a remote village in Litein area of Kenya popular for tea farming. She has been practicing mixed farming for the past 4 years and she has made great strides in terms of profit margins. This small scale farmer generates income through selling milk, tea and some personal business that she does, or “side hustle” as she likes to call it. She passionately loves poultry farming and the best part is when she wakes up every morning to collect eggs. The main challenge facing Rose is the constant perennial shortages of eggs and poultry products in her village and local market. She seeks to change this through borrowing a loan and buying more poultry. 

Rose is seeking a loan from Kiva lenders via Juhudi Kilimo to purchase additional poultry. With the loan, Rose will increase her income through selling eggs, poultry meat and also poultry feathers. The demand for poultry products in Litein area is very high and through the loan she will be able to satisfy the demand. Other than profits from poultry farming, she will also benefit from poultry manure, hence saving money that would have been used in purchasing fertilizers. The additional income from this expansion will permanently change her life and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy poultry

loans.name: Corazon

texts.en: Due to financial hardship, Corazon wants to access additional capital for her business. She is 47 years old and has three school-age children. She and her husband want to educate their children so that they can earn degrees and be employed someday. Corazon aims to make her business profitable in order to support their education. She would like a loan of PHP 8,000 to buy more beans, bitter melon, bananas, tomatoes, okra, cabbages and eggplant to resell. She believes that this loan will be a great help for her to improve the business.

loans.use: to buy more beans, bitter melon, bananas, tomatoes, okra, cabbages and eggplant to resell

loans.name: Faisal

texts.en: After Faisal successfully repaid the installments on his first loan from Kiva lenders, he applied for an another loan of 400,000 YER from Kiva to purchase another bus to increase his business. The first loan helped Faisal purchase a minibus and work on it as a driver. From that bus, Faisal earns a good profit that helps him provide his family with a better future. To further expand his business, he decided to apply for another loan to purchase another bus to rent and increase his monthly income. Faisal is a very dynamic and clever young man. He knows how to run his life well. He plans to increase his business more through purchasing many other buses and renting them to many drivers. Faisal warmly thanks Kiva lenders very much for the first loan and hopes to be financed for this loan.

loans.use: to purchase another bus to rent to increase his business and monthly income

loans.name: Phum

texts.en:
Phum lives in a village of Kampong Chhnang province. She is 44 and a married mother of six children, two of whom are in school. To make a living, she has been farming rice and raising pigs for 24 years. The current business earns her about 17,000 KHR per day to support the family's daily needs. 
Phum has just started with VisionFund for this loan. Now she is seeking a loan to buy a solar panel for lighting her house. She hopes to improve her living conditions. 

Note: This picture is with her husband.

loans.use: to buy a solar panel for lighting her house

loans.name: Martin

texts.en:
Martin is a recurrent borrower, aged 29 years old, who lives in a town council in Ntungamo. He is married and has applied for a loan of 4,000,000 UGX to improve his banana plantation. He has many people to supply Matooke to, especially in the towns of Rwashamaire and Ntungamo, but is always limited by the output that comes from the plantation. 

Martin wants to use the money to buy manure to spread over his plantation. He hopes this will increase his yields and income in the long run. He decided to come to UGAFODE for a loan to increase on his output, which will add on extra income for his household. 

He is hardworking and thanks the Kiva lenders for a job well done.

loans.use: to buy organic manure.

loans.name: Humaira

texts.en: Humaira is a 26-year-old, who lives in Rawalpindi. She is a hardworking housewife and a mother of two. Her husband is a rickshaw driver by profession. He has been driving a rickshaw for one year, but since he does not own a rickshaw, they do not have a proper source of income, which is a major problem. Therefore her husband wants to buy a rickshaw and become self-employed. This would help them to be more secure in terms of generating income. Humaira is supportive of her husband and wants to contribute in helping him to buy a new rickshaw. They are hopeful for a better future and plan to save some money for future purposes.

loans.use: to help her husband to buy a rickshaw to start a new business.

loans.name: Leonso

texts.es:
De 49 años de edad con grandes aspiraciones en la vida él se dio cuenta que nunca es tarde para empezar a trabajar con las energías de un joven, él tiene 5 hijos por quienes él está decidido a trabajar para tener una condición de vida adecuada, los primeros tres hijos ya están casados y viven con sus familias y los dos últimos son excelentes estudiantes en la escuela que les queda cerca de su comunidad.
La actividad principal del solicitante es la albañilería el lleva trabajando diez años dicha actividad porque desde niño él  ha tenido el sueño de convertirse en un gran y mejora albañil para construir las casas de las personas de su comunidad, a él se le ha convertido en una fuente de ingresos para el sostenimiento de su familia.
El uso respectivo que Leonso le dará al préstamo es para la compra de un terreno que se le ha ofrecido y para él es una oportunidad  que no piensa desaprovechar  ya que él quiere dejar un bonito recuerdo para sus hijos para que el trabajo que el realizo durante tantos años no fue en vano sino que valió la pena.
Uno de los más grandes sueños de él es ver crecer a sus hijos e convertirse en profesionales para el mañana, que ellos tangan más posibilidad de mejorar las condiciones de vida y que sean las adecuadas.
texts.en:
At the age of 49 with great hopes for life, Leonso has realized that it is never too late to start to work with the energy of a young man. He has five children for who he has decided to work to provide them with adequate living conditions. The oldest three are already married and live with their own families. The other two are excellent students in a school close to their community.

Leonso's principal work is as a bricklayer. He has ten years experience doing this. Since he was a kid he had the dream of becoming a great and excellent bricklayer building houses for people in his community. This has become a source of revenues for the sustenance of his family.

The use Leonso plans for the loan is to buy a plot of land that has been offered to him. It is an opportunity that he doesn't want to lose as it would be a nice memory for his children and so that the work he has done for so many years wasn't for nothing but worth the effort. One of his great dreams is to see his children become professionals in the future, that they have the possibility to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy land.

loans.name: Ollitas De Barro Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “OLLITAS DE BARRO” iniciará el tercer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Senkata, está compuesta por nueve  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Irina es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: tejido de chompas, venta de frutas, tienda de barrio, venta de zapatos, venta de comida, taller de cerrajería.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Irina es integrante, ella indica que hace dos años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de comida; da a conocer que este negocio lo emprendió de forma independiente, ya que tiene habilidad en la preparación de platos nacionales y decide implementar esta habilidad para la generación de recursos económicos. 
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de víveres por mayor) que adquirirá de las ferias de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, ya que ella es casada y tiene dos hijos.

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el ahorro que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Ollitas de Barro" will begin its third cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Centro Focal de Senkata. It is made up of nine members and is directed by a board of directors where Sra. Irina is the President. The businesses that the members of the communal association bring forward are varied, among them: knitting sweaters, fruit sales, convenience store, shoe sales, food sales and locksmith business. 
 
The loan that they take out will benefit the small microbusinesses where Sra. Irina is a member. She indicates that she joined Pro Mujer two years ago, joining by the invitation of a friend who is a customer of the institution. Currently she has a business selling food; she says that she started this business independently, since she has the ability to prepare national dishes and she decides to implemant this ability for the generation of economic resources. 

The loan that she will take out now is for the augmentation of capital (purchase of bulk supplies) that she will acquire from the markets in El Alto. After creating the plates she will sell them in her place of sale. This form of work will allow her to generate resources to support her family, as she is married and has two children. 

When she is asked about what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the savings that the institution offers.

loans.use: to buy bulk supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy two doors, cement, sand, and gravel to pave the floor of her home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy sticky rice to make traditional cakes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to replace her roof.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a slush machine.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca is aged 29, married to a farmer, and blessed with one child. She has owned and operated a retail store in her village for almost five years and earns a net income of PHP 2,000 weekly. Her income from this business is usually spent on electric bills and daily expenses.

Due to insufficient funds, Rebecca would like to take a loan amounting to PHP 15,000 to purchase cooking oil, sugar, coffee, canned goods, and noodles to sell. She is hoping that her business will become more productive.

loans.use: To purchase cooking oil, sugar, coffee, canned goods, and noodles to sell.

loans.name: Mugo

texts.en: Mugo is a married father of four children, ages 12 to 30 years old. He describes himself as determined. He operates a farm where he grows crops. He describes his biggest business challenge to be lack of funds. He will use the KES 100,000 loan to buy farm inputs. He hopes that in the future, he will be able to farm more land. This is his second loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. His previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs

loans.name: David

texts.en: David is a repeat customer located in Orubare, Ntungamo district. His major activity is farming. He has applied for loan of UGX 5,000,000. He wants to use the money to buy mulch and organic manure to improve his coffee plantation. He has a challenge of low productivity within his farming businesses due to poor farming methods. His prime target is to yield high output from his plantations. He also wants to send his children to better schools in the country. But he is limited by insufficient funds to enable him achieve his dreams. With this loan he believes his production will improve and his lifestyle will change. He is hard working and honest.

loans.use: To buy mulch and organic manure

loans.name: Haleema

texts.en: Haleema is a young and enthusiastic entrepreneur living in Rawalpindi. She is 27 years old and a mother of two. Not only does she look after her house, she also contributes to the family income by selling clothes from her house.This business has empowered her to pay for the daily expenses of her family. She has been in this business for four years. Her main objective is to save money for her children's education. But currently their expenses are more than the family income. Therefore she wants to increase her business by buying more clothes of different varieties to meet her customers' demands.  Given the growth in the sales she wants to create more demand by purchasing more clothes and increase her business. Therefore she has requested a loan from BRAC Pakistan, a Kiva partner, to help her buy more clothes to increase her business

loans.use: To increase her clothes business.

loans.name: Domiano

texts.en:
Domiano is a 35-year-old client. He lives in Ruhita Katomi in rural Ntungamo and is a farmer. He is married and has four children.

Domiano has applied for a loan of 2,500,000 UGX to buy organic manure to improve his coffee plantations. He faces the challenge of little income from his coffee plantations and, though he has many clients in the area since there are many coffee factories in the nearby trading center, the output is small. Therefore, Domiano wants to use this money to buy manure and standardize agriculture to a level that will give him good money. This will help him to educate his children in better schools.

loans.use: To buy organic manure to improve his coffee plantations

loans.name: Sopary

texts.en: Sopary is 19 years old and a student at an institute. She lives with her parents in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. Because of a lack of financial support, she would like to request a loan to pay for her tuition fee. This loan will help her graduate. In the future, she wants to find a good job.

loans.use: to pay for her tuition fee

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Kiva lenders! Meet Nancy who is 30 years of age, very hardworking, and a dedicated and honest farmer. She hails from Endebes, a remote rural area in Kitale. She is happily married and blessed with three lovely and adorable children. She practices mixed farming and has been doing it for the past three years and she has never looked back. Her primary source of income has been eggs, milk and crop farming. She also owns a motorbike that she uses for transportation of farm produce to the market. When asked what she enjoyed most, she said “poultry farming.” The Kitale area is a very populated region, and demand for poultry and poultry products is high. Like many farmers from her region, she finds poultry farming very enjoyable and fulfilling, but the biggest challenge she faces is meeting the demands. 

She is seeking a loan to buy additional poultry, so that she can be able to satisfy the demand for eggs from her neighbors and the local market. Poultry farming is a very profitable business venture, and the demand for chicken is always high because it is such a popular meal for many people.

With the loan Nancy will buy quality breeds of poultry that have high resistance to diseases and have high productivity.  This will assure her of high profit margins. Through your loan, you will be investing in an aspiring woman who wants to increase her poultry farming and sell to other towns and in the near future increase to neighboring countries. Increased profits will be used to pay back the loan and get out of the poverty bracket that she is in right now.

loans.use: to buy additional poultry for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to restock the items in her food business.

loans.name: Florance

texts.en: Florence, aged 27 years old, is married with two children aged between 6 and 8; both of them go to school. She has been selling bananas for the past six years. With the loan she would like to buy more bananas at a large quantity; the profit from the business will be used to renovate their house.

loans.use: to buy more bananas for resale.

loans.name: Hedson

texts.en: Hedson has been a client of Ugafode for three years now. He is 37 years old and a resident of Rutugunda, a rural area in Kajara Ntungamo district.  Hedson has a family of three children and has applied for a loan of UGX 3,000,000 to improve his banana plantation by buying manure like cow dung, mainly because it is cheap in the rural area. This will help to increase his output of bananas (matooke), which will increase his income and transform his lifestyle so that he has enough income for his family and to expand his plantations. Hedson hopes to buy cows for fattening so that he can have milk for his family.

loans.use: To buy organic manure to improve his banana plantation

loans.name: Shazia

texts.en:
Shazia is 34-year-old lady who lives with her three daughters and a son in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She owns a general store at her home, having allotted a portion of her house for the store. One of her drawing rooms opens through the front side of the house into the street, so she is utilizing that room for her general store. She offers many items such as rice, flour, pulses (peas and beans), sugar, cooking oil, detergent, soap and biscuits. 

She has been running this business for many years, and it is the major source of income for her family, because her husband's income is very poor. Now she wants to grow her business because of an increase in her family's needs. Shazia decided to contact Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan, for receiving a loan. She will buy rice, flour, pulses, sugar, cooking oil, detergent, soap and biscuits, and hopes that her store will work better than in the past.

loans.use: To buy inventory such as rice, flour, pulses, sugar, cooking oil, detergent, soap and biscuits.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es: Francisca de 54 años de edad, vive en casa propia con su hijo quien trabaja en la agricultura, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas, tiene mucha clientela con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar las necesidades de su hogar, Francisca solicita un crédito para comprar maíz por quintales y cal, para seguir con la elaboración de las tortillas y asi tener mejores ingresos para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Francisca, 54 years old, lives in her own house with her son who works in agriculture.  She works selling tortillas and she has a large customer base. With what she earns from her sales, she manages to pay for the household necessities. Francisca asks for a loan to purchase corn by the quintal (approx. 100 pounds) and lime, to continue making tortillas, and in this way have more income to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase corn by the quintal (approximately 100 pounds) and lime.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret is a female Kiva borrower. She describes herself as kind, God-fearing, and goal-oriented. Margaret operates a retail shop where she sells household items and offers M-pesa (mobile-phone based money transfer) services. She describes her main challenge as a lack of water.

Margaret will use this KES 75,000 loan to buy a water tank to store clean water for domestic use. She hopes that in the future, she will reduce her poverty and improve her living standards. This is her fifth loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. She repaid her previous loan successfully.

loans.use: to buy a water tank

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stock of fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Josiane

texts.en: Josiane is 30 years old, and she is married with one child who goes to school. She has been selling art products for past nine years. With the loan, she would like to buy more arts such as baskets, and then sell them outside the country. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for their child.

loans.use: to buy more art products such as baskets to sell outside the country.

loans.name: Donata

texts.en: Donata, age 26 years, is married with two children between 3 and 5 years old, and all of them go to school. She has been selling at a shop or boutique for the past eight years. With the loan, she would like to buy more items such as salt, sugar, biscuits and rice. The profit from the business will be used to pay school fees of their children.

loans.use: to buy more items such as salt, soap, sugar and rice to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente de 22 años de edad vive con su esposa y sus hermanos, el posee un taller de costura, el negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, tiene clientes establecidos que lo buscan por su buen trabajo, con las ganancias que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunas de las necesidades que se le presentan en su hogar, el cliente solicita un crédito para mejorar su taller y comprar telas, botones, agujas, hilos, etc. y así darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en: The client is 22 years old and lives with his wife and siblings.  He has a tailoring shop, and the business is located in his residence.  He has established customers who seek him out for his good work. With the earnings that he gets from his work, he manages to cover some of the necessities that come up in his household. The client asks for a loan to improve his workshop and to purchase fabric, buttons, needles, thread, etc., and in this way give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase fabric, buttons, needles, thread, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, gravel, iron, metal sheeting, purlins and pins to build a covered walkway in her home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, gravel, purlins, metal sheeting, and pins to replace the roof of her house and cement the floor of the covered walkway.

loans.name: Qurbonoy

texts.ru:
Курбоной добрая жизнерадостная женщина из района Вахш. Ей 49 лет. Она мать двоих сыновей и двоих дочерей. Дети еще учатся, а муж работает вдали от семьи, в Российской Федерации. 
Курбоной успевает и вести домашнее хозяйство и одновременно заниматься животноводством. Она разводит в основном крупнорогатый скот и занимается этой деятельностью на протяжении более 10 лет. У нее созданы хорошие условия для выращивания бычков. Она берет корм для скота с приусадебного участка, а также с пастбищных земель, поэтому у нее не бывает проблем с кормом. 
Курбоной сейчас решила увеличить доходность бизнеса и поэтому берет кредит, чтобы купить еще одного бычка для откорма и перепродажи. Она надеется на вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Qurbonoy is a kind and cheerful woman from the Vakhsh district. She is 49 and the mother of two sons and two daughters. Her children are in school and her husband works far away from home in Russia. Qurbonoy manages to do the housework and raise livestock at the same time. She mainly raises cattle and has been doing so for over ten years. She has created excellent conditions for raising young bulls. She gets feed from the fields and pasture land, so she does not have a problem feeding them. Qurbonoy has decided to increase her business's profitability and take out a loan to buy another young bull to feed and resell. She hopes for your support.

loans.use: to buy a small young bull and increase her livestock headcount

loans.name: Isaac

texts.en: Isaac is 66 years old. He is married with five children between 30 and 14 years old. Four of them go to school. He has been selling charcoal for the past two years. With this loan, he would like to buy more charcoal in order to become a wholesaler. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to buy more charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Yosia

texts.en: Yosia is a repeat borrower.  He is 45 years old and resides in a rural area. He is married man and has nine children. He is applying for a loan of 2,500,000 UGX, with the purpose to buy cows for fattening and then to sell them later.  He has enough land, but he does not have enough cows to occupy that farmland. Also, there is a good market for milk in the main trading centers of Rubaare and Rwentobo.  He has a challenge of few cows on the farmland and thinks buying more he would have more milk.  Hence, he could get enough income to educate his children in universities. With this loan he believes his production will improve and this lifestyle will change in the society.

loans.use: to buy cattle to fatten and sell.

loans.name: Telman

texts.en:
Telman is 57 years old, married and he has two kids. For many years Telman has worked in farming, with his main crop being lemons. The work is going very well as he has many years' experience and because he always worries about giving his customers the highest quality products. But he has a problem with water access so every time he gets water from a neighbor. For this reason he is asking for a loan of 600 AZN so that he can obtain a water pump to irrigate and expand his lemon crops.

Telman is very grateful to Kiva lenders because, thanks to their support, he will be able to buy a water pump.

loans.use: to buy a water pump.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her tuition fees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy electrical appliances.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy textiles, thread and needles.

loans.name: Nelson Jhovany

texts.es: Nelson de 32 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus 4 hijos de 16, 14, 11 y 9 años de edad. Él es reconocido por sus vecinos como un hombre responsable y trabajador que se desempeña como jardinero desde hace 10 años, gracias a su experiencia, su trabajo es muy demandado y su cartera de clientes crece cada día más. Nelson desea instalar energía eléctrica en su vivienda, es por ello que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: alambre, interruptores y caja térmica para instalar energía eléctrica en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Nelson, 32, lives in his own residence with his life partner and his four children, 16, 14, 11, and 9 years old.  He is known by his neighbors as a responsible and hard-working man who has worked as a gardener for ten years.  Thanks to his experience, his work is much in demand and his portfolio of clients grows larger every day.  Nelson wants to install electricity in his residence and for this reason he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in wire, switches, and a thermal box in order to install electricity in his residence.

.

loans.use: to invest in wire, switches, and a thermal box in order to install electricity in his residence.

loans.name: Liliana Jannet

texts.es:
Liliana una mujer cuyo corazón es tan bello como las flores que cultiva, inicio su negocio hace aproximadamente 4 años y adquirió sus conocimientos gracias a que trabajaba en una planta productora de hortalizas. 

Debido a la zona en que vive la cual es muy afectada por lluvias y fuertes granizadas se ve en la necesidad de solicitar un crédito para adecuar sus campos y protegerlo contra el clima dado que en muchas ocasiones pierde sus cultivos.

El crédito será invertido en la compra de redes, plásticos, alambres, madera, grapadora y herramientas y mano de obra para la construcción de una fuerte para cuidar sus preciadas plantas. 


La labor de esta mujer es de admirar porque ella sola mantiene a sus dos hijos de 18 y 11 años de edad y brinda los recursos para pagar las cuentas de la finca para evitar futuros embargues por eso mucha gente depende de lo que produzca Liliana  apóyenla bríndele la oportunidad de mejorar su negocio.
texts.en:
Liliana is a woman whose heart is as wonderful as the flowers that she grows. Liliana started her business around four years ago after having gained knowledge on the work from her job at a business growing vegetables.

Given that the area where Liliana lives has a lot of rain and hail, she needs to apply for a loan in order to adapt her land and protect it against the climate. If she does not, she may lose crops.

This loan will be used to buy nets, plastic sheets, wires, wood, a stapling gun and other tools, and to pay labourers to build a space to look after her prized plants.

Liliana's work is admirable as she alone is raising two children - aged 18 and 11 years old - and providing an income to cover the costs of her work. She wants to avoid future problems and many people are depending on Liliana's products.

Please support her and give her the opportunity to improve her business.

loans.use: to protect her flower products from harsh weather and continue selling flowers to provide for her family.

loans.name: Erika Alejandra

texts.es:
Sin mucho capital, Erika montó su taller de confección con el ánimo de generar ingresos con los cuales pueda sostener los gastos de su hogar donde convive con su esposo y con su hijo. 

La actividad la aprendió haciendo algunos cursos y esto le ha permitido realizar trabajos que se caracterizan por su buena calidad y su puntualidad en la entrega. Con sus trabajos, Erika ha logrado sacar adelante su negocio, por lo que espera que siga creciendo y posteriormente pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas. 

Con la finalidad de responder a un gran pedido que le ha hecho un cliente, Erika busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de insumos que requiere para la confección como son agujas, hilos y telas y poder así responder a los pedidos que le han hecho sus clientes.

Laura espera que así siga creciendo su negocio y su familia pueda gozar de unos mejores ingresos los cuales les permitan tener una mejor calidad de vida y un estudio de mejor calidad.
texts.en:
With little capital, Erika started her dressmaking workshop in order to earn an income to cover the costs of running her household. Erika lives with her husband and son.

Erika learned dressmaking by doing some courses and these have allowed her to carry out good-quality work that is delivered on time. Through her work Erika has managed to help her business to move forward and she hopes that it will continue to grow and that she will be able to provide jobs to those who need them.

With an aim to fulfill a large order from a customer, Erika is applying for a loan in order to buy the supplies she needs for dressmaking. Erika will buy needles, threads, material and more in order to fulfill orders from customers.

Erika hopes that her business will continue to grow and that her family can enjoy a higher income. This would allow the family to have a higher quality of life and a better education.

loans.use: to buy dressmaking supplies like needles, thread and textiles to meet growing demand and improve her family´s quality of life.

loans.name: Jean

texts.en: Jean is age 40. He is married with nine children between 16 years and 5 months old. Six of them go to school. He is a carpenter; he has been running his business for the past 25 years. With this loan, he would like to buy more wood in order to make twenty beds for sale. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees and to renovate the house.

loans.use: To buy more wood in order to make twenty beds for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials to improve his farm and reach his dream of running a business and providing for his family.

loans.name: Maria Rubiela

texts.es:
Rubiela es una muy honorable mujer que nunca quiso dejar a sus padres solos pues sabía que tenía quebrantos de salud y necesitaban a una persona que estuviera hay incondicionalmente para cuidarlos y amarlos. 

Como la medicina no era gratis logro montar una pequeña tienda con la cual ha podido mantener los gastos de su hogar aunque muy apretados y limitados pero en todo caso en su hogar no falta nada pues con una mujer tan luchadora y emprendedora no dejara que a sus padres y familia les falte algo.

Solicita un crédito para la compra de mercancía que aunque el barrio está muy consciente de la hermosa labor que realiza hay fuerte competencia en el sector y necesita surtir y tener más productos a disposición de los clientes.

Su gran sueño es montar un mercado de alimentos donde pueda emplear a personas de bajos recursos que como ella saben lo difícil que se puede tornar la vida.
texts.en:
Rubiela is an honorable woman who never wanted to leave her parents alone because she knew they had health problems and needed a person to be there unconditionally to care for them and love them.
 
Since medicine wasn't free, she was able to open a small store with which she has been able to pay for the household expenses, although things are very tight and limited. In any case, her home lacks for nothing because she is a woman who is such a fighter and who is enterprising and will not allow her parents and family to lack anything.   

She is asking for a loan to buy merchandise. Although the neighborhood is very aware of the beautiful work she does, there is strong competition in the area and she needs to stock her store and have more products available for her customers.   

Her big dream is to open a food market where she can hire people of low income who like her know how difficult life can be.

loans.use: to buy food and other stock for her shop.

loans.name: Hanife Reyhan

texts.en:
Hanife is married and the mother of three children. She dropped out of school to learn hairdressing. She and her husband have worked in hairdressing for 20 years. 

Hanife learned about Tupperware from her friends and began to use the products. Later she joined the Tupperware organization as a sales representative. She has sold Tupperware for two years to make extra income.  With this loan she will buy goods to sell. Her goal is to put her children through school and provide them a good future.

loans.use: to buy goods to sell.

loans.name: Maria Luz Dary

texts.es:
Maria, de 41 años, tiene gran experiencia en el área de la confección gracias a sus múltiples empleos en diferentes fabricas donde trabajaba como operaria de maquinas de confección.

Hoy en día es una mujer independiente y gana sus propios ingresos a través de la confección de una pequeña línea propia.

Es una mujer muy emprendedora y su motivación más grande para trabajar son sus hijos quienes en algunas ocasiones le ayudan en su negocio.

Ella tiene muchos proyectos los cuales desea cumplir en la medida de lo posible, pero para eso necesita la ayuda de un auxilio económico el cual le permitirá inyectarle capital a su negocio a través de la compra de insumos como tela, hilos, agujas, entre otros.

Con este préstamo ella podrá mantener su actividad vigente y seguirá ofreciendo empleo a las personas del sector.

De esta actividad depende el sostenimiento de su familia, es por eso que imprime fuerza y empeño a su trabajo.
texts.en:
Maria, 41, has extensive experience in the area of clothing manufacturing thanks to several jobs in different factories where she worked as a machine operator. 
Nowadays she is an independent woman and earns her own income through her own small clothing line. 
She is a very enterprising woman, and her biggest motivation for her work is her children, who sometimes help her with her business. 
She has many projects that she would like to complete as soon as possible, but in order to do that, she needs some financial help which will allow her to inject capital into her business through the purchase of supplies such as fabric, thread, needles, etc. 
With this loan she will be able to keep her existing business and continue to provide employment to people in the industry. 
Her family depends on this business, and that is why she puts so much effort and commitment into her work.

loans.use: to purchase textiles, thread, needles to make and sell clothing to provide for her family.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to start her own grocery shop selling basic foods such as grains, produce and cleaning products.

loans.name: Sandra Maritza

texts.es:
37 años de edad, un gran sentido de responsabilidad y un incansable espíritu luchador son los que caracterizan a la señora Sandra que diariamente se enfrenta a entidades de espacio público que en ocasiones la molestan por sacar su puesto de venta de buñuelos, palitos de queso, empanas que ubica en la calle.

Sandra es una mujer soltera con dos hijos de 9 y 5 años con un sueño muy grande y es poder obtener un permiso para vender sus productos pues con ellos ha podido sostener a sus amados hijos.


Solicita un crédito para realizar reformas a su carro de comidas necesarias para obtener dicho permiso y trabajar tranquilamente por el futuro de sus dos hijos, también comprara materia prima para producir más y obtener mejores beneficios que son muy necesarios en su humilde hogar.
texts.en:
At 37 years old, a great sense of responsibility and a tireless fighting spirit are characteristic of Sandra. Every day, she faces entities in the public space who on occasion bother her for selling buñuelos, palitos de queso, and empanadas in the street.  

Sandra is a single woman with two children, aged 9 and 5. Her big dream is to obtain a permit to sell her products, because that is how she has been been able to support her beloved children. 

She is asking for a loan to make some changes on her food cart necessary to obtain the permit and work in peace for the future of her two children. She will also buy materials to produce more and obtain better profits that she really needs for her humble home.

loans.use: to improve her food cart to gain a permit and to buy empanada and baked good ingredients that will help her provide for her humble household.

loans.name: Yilda Argentina

texts.es:
Yilda tiene un trabajo muy curioso que pocas veces se puede presentar y es que sigue en todas las giras a un circo pero no como cirquera, si no como una vendedora de comidas rápidas. 

El trabajo aunque hay mucha circulación de personas es muy difícil por la competencia que hay. 

Solicita un crédito para la compra de un mejor surtido y ofrecer variedad de productos, comprara carne, panes, salchichas, papas.

Para Yilda es de suma importancia esta oportunidad crediticia pues será la manera en que se sostendrá en el tiempo y más importante comenzar a recoger recursos para comprar su casa propia que es el anhelo de ella y sus dos hijos.
texts.en: Yilda has a very curious job that she is rarely able to do.  She follows every circus tour, but she is not a circus performer.  She is a fast food salesperson.  Although there are a lot of people circulating, the job is difficult because of the competition.  She is requesting the loan to purchase a better assortment and offer a variety of products such as meat, bread, sausages, and potatoes.  For Yilda, this loan opportunity is vital because this is the way she will support herself in time and, most importantly, begin saving money to purchase her own home, something both she and her two children desire.

loans.use: to purchase meat, bread, potatoes to sell meals at a circus so she can one day pay buy a home.

loans.name: Salome

texts.en: Salome is a married woman with five  children. She describes herself as determined. She has sold beauty products and other items for nine years. Her primary customers are locals. She will use the 20,000 KES loan  to buy more beauty products and other items. She hopes to own an independent business in the future. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy more beauty products and other items to sell.

loans.name: Miguel Humberto

texts.es: Miguel de 36 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus 2 hijos de 10 y 6 años de edad. Él es un hombre trabajador que se desempeña como jornalero en una finca cercana a su cantón. Miguel desea realizar la instalación de energía eléctrica en su vivienda por lo que está solicitando a FUSAI un crédito para invertir en: alambre, interruptores, caja térmica y mano de obra para la instalación de energía eléctrica en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Miguel is 36 years old. He lives in his own home with his life companion and his two children who are 10 and 6 years old. He is a hard working man who works as a laborer on a farm near his canton. 

Miguel wants to install electricity in his home which is why he is asking for a loan through FUSAI to invest in: wire, circuit breakers, and a fuse box and labor for the installation of electricity in his home.

loans.use: to invest in wire, circuit breakers, and a fuse box and labor for the installation of electricity in his home.

loans.name: Nelson Vladimir

texts.es: Nelson de 23 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus 2 hijos de 7 y 3 años de edad. Él es un hombre muy reconocido por su integridad, actualmente se desempeña como encargado de una finca, actividad que realiza desde hace 3 años y la cual le ha permitido dar una solidez económica a su familia. Nelson desea invertir en la instalación de energía eléctrica que actualmente no posee en su vivienda por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: alambre, interruptores y una caja térmica para la instalación de energía eléctrica en su vivienda.
texts.en: Nelson, 23, lives in his own residence with his life partner and his two children, 7 and 3 years old.  He is a man well-recognized for his integrity.  Nowadays he works as a manager of a farm, which he has done for three years and which has permitted him to give economic solidity to his family.  Nelson wants to invest in the installation of electricity which he now does not have in his residence, and for this reason he requests a loan from FUSAI to invest in wire, switches, and a thermal box in order to install electricity in his residence.

loans.use: to invest in wire, switches, and a thermal box in order to install electricity in his residence.

loans.name: Yesica Natalia

texts.es:
Yesica es una mujer emprendedora y dinámica de 21 años de edad, dedicada a su familia y al comercio independiente; ya que desde hace 3 años comenzó a vender mercancía a sus familiares, amigos y vecinos, con el fin de generar ingresos para aportar a la economía de su hogar.

El crédito que solicita es un apoyo para fortalecer su negocio y su inventarios, por lo que invertirá el dinero en la compra de surtido al por mayor (jeans, camisas, camisetas) con este crédito mejorara considerablemente sus situación económica y continuara trabajando para su sostenimiento y el de sus hijos.

Yesica tiene el firme propósito de sacar adelante su proyecto productivo, pues quiere convertirse en una empresaria exitosa y garantizar una mejor calidad de vida y bienestar para su grupo familiar.
texts.en:
Yesica is an enterprising and dynamic woman. She is 21 years old and is dedicated to her family and to her business. She started out three years ago, selling merchandise to relatives, friends, and neighbors in order to generate an income and contribute to her household economy.

She will use the loan she is requesting as support to strengthen her business and her inventory by investing the money in purchasing wholesale merchandise like jeans, shirts, and t-shirts. This loan will allow her to substantially improve her financial situation and she will keep working to support herself and her children.

Yesica's firm goal is to implement her business project because she wants to become a successful entrepreneur and secure a better quality of life and well-being for her family.

loans.use: to buy clothes to restock her shop that will increase her income and improve her children´s quality of life.

loans.name: Theobard

texts.en: Theobard, 35, is married with three children between the ages of 2 and 12 years old. Two children attend school. His wife sells food stuffs and Theobard sells flowers. He has been running this business for the past five years. With the loan, he would like to buy different flowers used for decoration to sell. With the profit from the business,Theobard will pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: To buy different flowers for decoration  for sale.

loans.name: Jesus Maria

texts.es:
Jesús de 60 años, vive en unión libre y tiene dos hijos, desde hace 10 años tiene una pequeña chaza en la que vende dulces, algunas bebidas y frituras, la cual atiende todos los días.

Con este trabajo ha podido sacar adelante a su hijo y esposa a base de esfuerzo y trabajo duro.

Tiene como sueño ampliar y surtir su chaza. En la actualidad tiene poco surtido y esto es perjudicial ya que no puede suplir con muchos productos que le pide su clientela. 

Jesús en vista de esto optó en solicitar dicho préstamo con el fin de organizarse más y comprar al por mayor el surtido necesario (granos, azúcar, galletería, lácteos) para incrementar su stock y poder brindar mejor atención a las personas,  esto le representaría también el aumento en sus ingresos para cumplir necesidades básicas de todo negocio como son los servicios públicos, impuestos, y demás, y también mejorar el bienestar de él y el de su familia.
texts.en:
Jesús is 60 years old. He lives in a free union relationship and has two children. For 10 years he has had a little stall that he tends every day, where he sells sweets, some beverages, and fried foods.

With this work he has been able to help his son and his wife on the basis of his effort and hard work.

His dream is to expand and stock his stall. He now has little stock, and this is harmful because he cannot supply many products that his clientele ask for.

In light of this, Jesús opted to apply for this loan with the goal of organizing himself better and buying the necessary stock (grains, sugar, baked goods, dairy products) wholesale to increase his stock and be able to offer better service to people. This would also represent an increase in his income to meet the basic requirements of all businesses, such as public services, taxes, and other items, and also to improve his well-being and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy groceries for his shop in order to increase his family's income

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make and sell homemade cleaning products to pay for her son´s education.

loans.name: Luis Fernando

texts.es:
Luis es un campesino de 46 años de edad, trabajador y humilde, que desde niño aprendió a realizar todas las labores del campo, gracias a las enseñanzas de sus padres. 

Esto le ha permitido progresar y, hoy en día posee cultivos de café, asiste su negocio todos los días y las cosechas son vendidas en la plaza de mercado del municipio, adicionalmente, realiza labores de jornalero en diferentes fincas de la región, pues con ello complementa los ingresos para el sostenimiento de su familia. 

Con el apoyo del crédito comprará insumos agrícolas al por mayor (abonos, pesticidas, fertilizantes y otros), con esto seguirá cuidando sus cultivos y tendrá una mejor cosecha, mucho más productiva, con lo que mejorará los ingresos a la hora de vender sus productos. 

Luis, con su espíritu emprendedor, su pujanza y tenacidad, quiere seguir luchando para cumplir el sueño de tener una finca propia, en la que pueda cultivar mucha más variedad de productos y así mejorar la rentabilidad del negocio, garantizando una estabilidad económica para dar mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Luis is 46 year old farmer. He is hardworking and humble, and since he was a child he learned how to complete all types of farm work thanks to his father's teachings. 

This has allowed him to move forward, and today he owns coffee crops. He attends to his business everyday and his harvests are sold in the market square of the town. Additionally, he works as a day labourer on different estates in the area, thus supplementing his income to support his family. 

With the support of this loan he will buy wholesale agricultural materials (composts, pesticides, fertilizers, among others). With this, he will continue to care for his crops and will have a better, more productive harvest, which will improve his earnings when selling his products. 

Luis, with his entrepreneurial spirit, his drive and tenacity, wants to continue striving to achieve his dream of having his own estate, on which he could cultivate a greater variety of products and improve the profitability of his business, guaranteeing financial stability and giving a better quality of life to his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and compost in bulk to improve his coffee crop.

loans.name: Sergio

texts.es:
El señor Sergio es un hombre que ha luchado mucho a lo largo de su vida, vive en el municipio de Medellín y cada día se esfuerza para ser mejor.

El es un hombre muy trabajador y desde hace 5 años viene trabajando en el negocio de la venta de artesanías y ropa para todo tipo de personas.

Su negocio consiste en la compra y venta de muebles mercancía que posteriormente en las ferias de artesanías. 

El ofrece sus productos de manera ambulante en algunas ocasiones y sus principales clientes son amigos y familiares.

El solicita un préstamo para la compra de surtido de ropa y de artesanías para aprovechar las ferias que vienen. Este es su único medio de ingresos y con el ha tratado de salir adelante y superarse.

El préstamo le dará la oportunidad de capitalizar su negocio y de darle un impulso considerable a su actividad.
texts.en:
Mr. Sergio is a hardworking man who has fought hard throughout his life. He lives in the town of Medellín and strives every day to be better. 

For five years he has been selling handicrafts and clothing for all types of people. His business consists of buying and selling furniture in craft fairs. He sometimes sells his products on foot and his main clients are his family and friends. 

He is requesting a loan to purchase an assortment of clothes and crafts to take advantage of the upcoming fairs. This is his only means of income and with it he has tried to move forward and improve himself.

The loan will give him the opportunity to grow his business and give it a significant boost.

loans.use: to buy clothing and handicrafts to sell during Festival of Flowers.

loans.name: Carlos Fernando

texts.es:
Carlos es un hombre humilde y trabajador que ha dedicado gran parte de su vida al cuidado de sus hijos, vive en el municipio de Puerto Salgar desde donde se desempeña espectacularmente en la cocina ya que su negocio es la preparación de comidas por encargo como lo son los tamales, chorizos, empanadas, comidas típicos de Colombia, entre otros.

Estos alimentos los venden principalmente a vecinos del sector quienes conocen la sazón de Carlos y saben que siempre obtendrán alimentos deliciosos y muy bien preparados.

Carlos desea aumentar su venta de alimentos y mejorar la prestación de sus servicios, por esta razón solicita un préstamo para la compra de una gratinadora y compra de insumos e ingredientes para continuar realizando sus recetas.

Este préstamo le permitirá sacar adelante su negocio para obtener así los ingresos necesarios que le den la oportunidad de continuar sosteniendo a su familia.

Sueña con abrir su propio restaurante y consolidarlo.
texts.en:
Carlos is a modest and hardworking man who has devoted a big part of his life to taking care of his children.  He lives in the town of Puerto Salgar.

He works spectacularly in the kitchen, because his business is making food on request: tamales, chorizo, empanadas, traditional Colombian dishes, and other food.  Carlos sells these dishes mainly to neighbors in the area who are familiar with his seasoning and who know they'll always get delicious, well-prepared food.

Carlos wants to increase his food sales and improve his service.  He's requesting a loan to buy a grill as well as supplies and ingredients to keep on making his recipes.  This loan will allow him to get his business ahead and earn the income he needs to keep supporting his family.

He dreams of opening his own restaurant and become established.

loans.use: to buy a grill to make traditional recipes to attract customers so he can provide for his family.

loans.name: Xalil

texts.en:
Xalil is a 44-year-old married man, and he is the father of three daughters. Xalil's family is IDP (internally displaced persons), and they live in an IDP settlement. His wife is a housekeeper. He raises vegetables (greens, potatoes, onions, tomatoes and so on) and fruit trees (apples, pears, etc.). His monthly income is 150 Azerbaijani manats (AZN). He has 17 years of experience in this field. He makes an additional small income working as a driver. People living in IDP settlements have high demands for such products as fresh fruits and vegetables. They prepare juice, fruit pies, etc. and make different kinds of salads. 

Xalil needs to improve the conditions of his garden. He applied for a 500 AZN loan to buy garden tools and to repair it.

loans.use: to buy farming tools

loans.name: Annick

texts.en: Annick is married with three children, ages between 6 and 15. All attend  school. She has sold clothing and retail items for the past three years. With the loan, Annick would like to buy more clothing to sell. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest in her business.

loans.use: to buy clothing to sell.

loans.name: Bassam

texts.en:
Bassam is a 29-year-old single man from Beddya, a village near Nablus city. He started working as a building contractor four years ago. It is a good business and Bassam earned his experience from his previous job. 

Bassam took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy tiles and some construction tools he needs in his business. By taking this loan, Bassam will be able to improve his business and increase his income. 

Bassam appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy tiles  and some construction tools he needs in his business.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Miguel de 44 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus 4 hijos de 18, 16, 10 y 3 años de edad. Él es conocido en su localidad por ser un hombre emprendedor que se dedica a la venta de verduras en el mercado municipal, actividad que realiza desde hace 6 años. Miguel desea instalar energía eléctrica en su vivienda, ya que actualmente no cuenta con este servicio en su vivienda por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: alambre, interruptores y una caja térmica, además deberá pagar mano de obra para la instalación de energía eléctrica en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Miguel is 44 years old and lives in his own house with his life companion and his four children who are 18, 16, 10, and 3 years old. He is known in his town as an enterprising man who sells vegetables in the municipal market, an activity that he has been doing for 6 years.

Miguel wants to install electricity in his home. Currently he does not have this service in his housing which is why he is asking for a loan from FUSAI in order to invest in wire, circuit breakers and a fuse box, and he must pay for labor for the electricity installation in his home.

loans.use: to invest in wire, circuit breakers and a fuse box, and he must also pay for labor to have electricity installed in his home

loans.name: Rock Of Ages 2  Group

texts.en:
This group Rock of Ages 2 is made up of eight people who are driven by a clear desire to change the living conditions of their respective families. They enjoy being together and have good experience in their respective business and are on their first loan cycle. They all live in the same area and share strong ties. Their main activities are selling of phone cards, electronics, tea, noddles, fresh fish, cosmetics, lining, stationary and waakye (cooked rice and beans). 

Ebenezer (standing third at the far left in the photo) is the representative of this group. He is a very dynamic man and plays a decisive role in the development of the group. He is 44-years-old, married, and father of one child. He has a place at his residence where he sells phone cards. He has extensive experience in this domain. With this loan, he wants to buy more and different phone cards and sell to customers. The profits will allow him to increase his savings and better help his child.

They will hold each other for repayment of the loan.

loans.use: To buy more and different phone cards

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
Daniel has been a client of UGAFODE for three cycles now. He is 45 years old, married with eight children and  a resident of rural Ntungamo. He is applying for a loan of 3,500,000 UGX, to clear his farm and buy cows to fatten and sale. He will also buy veterinary drugs for the cows and a spraying pump. 

Daniel supplies 1,000 liters of milk per day and if he can clear more land on his farm, he believes he could supply 1,500 liters each day. There is a good market for milk in the neighboring trading centers. He hopes to  be able to earn enough income to educate his children through the university level.  With this loan, he believes his production will improve and so will his income.

loans.use: To buy cows and veterinary drugs.

loans.name: Carmen Patricia

texts.es:
Carmen es una muy trabajadora mujer dedica al mundo de la culinaria con la que ha logrado sacar a sus dos hijos adelante sola ejerciendo el papel de padre y madre. 

Gracias a dos créditos que tomo en la corporación mejoro sus capacidades culinarias y lo mejor es que se destaca por ser una persona de muy buen hábito de pago.

Solicita un nuevo crédito con la ilusión de mejorar su negocio pues tiene que estar preparada para cualquier evento que se le presente y es que en muchas ocasiones la ponen a trabajar en tiempo récord y quiere predecir estos eventos y no perder la oportunidad de tener un buen contrato, el crédito lo invertirá en su totalidad en compra ingredientes como cebollas, tomates y otros condimentos, tambien comprara los frascos de vidrio en los que envasa sus alimentos.
Para ella el crédito es de gran importancia pues solo tiene este negocio, solo este modo de vida le ha resultado rentable y ya por su avanzada edad no puede encontrar un nuevo trabajo por lo que debe cuidar lo que tiene por eso requiere la ayuda de cooperantes que le ayuden en su causa a una mujer de 55 años de edad que sueña y quiere seguir ejerciendo su profesión por mucho mas tiempo.
texts.en:
Carmen is a very hard-working woman who makes her living in the culinary world, which has allowed her to support her two children alone, serving as both mother and father.  

Thanks to two loans she received from the cooperative she increased her culinary capabilities, and the best part is she showed herself to be very regular with her payments.  

She is asking for a new loan in order to improve her business so she can be prepared for anything that happens, since on many occasions events force her to work in record time. She wants to plan ahead for such events and not loose the opportunity for a good contract. The loan will in its entirely be invested in buying supplies like onions, tomatoes, fruits, condiments and jars to make and sell preserves to maintain her only source of income.

For her, this loan is very important because she only has this business, it is the only means of making a living that has proved worthwhile, and because of her advanced age she can’t find a new job. For this reason she needs to take care of her current business and requires contributors to help her. She is a 55-year-old woman who has dreams and wants to continue exercising her profession for a long time.

loans.use: to buy onions, tomatoes, fruits, condiments and jars to make and sell preserves to maintain her only source of income.

loans.name: Eva Esperanza

texts.es: Eva de 52 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su nieto de 4 años de edad y su grupo familiar. Ella es una mujer que gracias a su tenacidad ha sacado adelante a sus hijos que en la actualidad son mayores de edad y le apoyan económicamente. Eva desea instalar energía eléctrica en su vivienda y es para ello que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: interruptores, caja térmica, alambre y mano de obra necesaria para instalar energía eléctrica en su vivienda.
texts.en: Eva, 52, lives in her residence with her four-year-old grandson and her family group.  She is a woman who thanks to her tenacity has helped her children get ahead so that now they are grown and help her out economically.  Eva wants to install electricity in her residence, and for this reason she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy switches, a thermal box, wire, and the labor necessary to install electricity in her residence.

loans.use: to buy switches, a thermal box, wire, and the labor necessary to install electricity in her residence.

loans.name: Dorita Asuncion

texts.es:
Dorita tiene 33 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijo, en casa familiar, en una comunidad grande en la zona urbana de Buenos aires, goza con buenas referencias personales y laborales por parte de sus vecinos, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, y su comunidad está ubicada en la Provincia de Morropón que pertenece al departamento de Piura, costa norte del Perú.

La actividad que realiza Dorita es la venta de productos como: venta de plasticos y venta de productos de belleza que va ofreciendo por su zona, y además de tener stok en su domicilio, ella ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2500 nuevos soles para construcción y seguir con las mejoras en su casa, esto le permitira tener una mejor calidad de vida a toda su familia.
texts.en:
Dorita is 33 years old. She lives with her husband and son, in the family home, in a large community in the urban area of Buenos Aires. She has good personal and work references from her neighbors. The population engages in agriculture, trade, and livestock, and her community is located in the province of Morropón that belongs to the department of Piura, on the northern coast of Perú. 

Dorita works selling products such as plastics and beauty products that she offers throughout the area, and she also has goods in her home. She is asking for a loan from Edpyme Alternative of 2500 soles for construction so she can continue improvements to her home. This will allow all of her family to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to pay construction costs so she can continue improving her home

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Hello, World! Meet Jane, a hardworking and dedicated mother of six lovely children from Chebuyo, a remote village in the Siongiroi area of Kenya. Her determination, self-drive and passion have seen her practice farming for the past 15 years. Being a small-scale mixed farmer, her primary source of income is milk sales, crops and some personal business that she does to make ends meet. She passionately loves dairy farming, and when asked what she enjoys most, her reply was “selling milk and feeding my dairy cows”. 

Although this humble mother makes profit through selling milk, she is faced with one big challenge: lack of a dairy unit. She is seeking a loan to build a modern dairy unit. Dairy cows require a proper dairy unit, where they can comfortably rest and feed so that they can produce the maximum amount of milk. Also, a dairy unit is used to protect animals from diseases that are caused by harsh weather conditions. Jane dreams of developing her milk-selling business into a large enterprise and keeping more dairy cows. With this loan, she will have no challenge milking and feeding her cows. Through financial solutions from Kiva lenders, she is going to achieve her dream and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To build a modern dairy unit

loans.name: Otabek

texts.ru:
Отабек жизнерадостный и трудолюбивый мужчина в возрасте 53 лет. Он женат и имеет двоих детей. Он обратился в Арванд впервые, когда узнал, что есть возможность получить финансовую поддержку. Сам Отабек живёт со своей семьёй в небольшой деревне. Он имеет высшее образование и вот уже как 16 лет работает учителем в местной школе. Жена Отабека  не имеет образования и является домохозяйкой, она занимается домашними делами и воспитанием детей.

Чтобы иметь достаточный доход на пропитание, Отабек занимается также своим бизнесом. У него имеется собственный продуктовый магазин. От данного бизнеса он получает хороший доход. Жена также помогает Отабеку в его деле, она находиться в магазине и следит за порядком, когда сам Отабек находиться на работе в школе. Сейчас Отабек собирается женить своего старшего сына. Он готовиться к свадебному мероприятию. Для этого нужно купить очень много вещей для приданного. Но у Отабека не хватает денежных средств, которые он накопил для свадьбы. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку приданного для свадьбы своего сына. Отабек очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Otabek is a cheerful, hardworking man. He is 53, married, and has two children. He applied for a loan with Arvand for the first time when he learned it was possible to receive financial support. Otabek and his family live in a small village. He has a university education and has taught at a local school for 16 years. His wife does not have an education and takes care of their home and children. 

In order to be able to buy food, Otabek has his own a grocery store. He earns a good income and his wife helps him by watching the store when he has to work at the school. Otabek is getting ready for his son's wedding ceremony, but to do this he has to buy many things for the dowry. He does not have enough money saved to buy everything for the wedding. This is why he came to Arvand for a loan, to buy a dowry for his son's wedding. Otabek hopes for a positive result and thanks Arvand in advance for their support.

loans.use: to buy a dowry for his son's wedding

loans.name: Hürmüz Filiz

texts.en:
Hürmüz is 65 and the mother of three children. She has sold Tupperware for 12 years. At first, Hürmüz just used Tupperware. She always bought it for herself and her children. Then a friend suggested she start selling to make some money and to buy the products at lower prices. She began selling and has been successful at this job for 12 years. Now she is a group leader and has a lot of members under her. She is very happy with this job, both making money and participating in various outings, she says. With this loan she will buy goods. She wants to improve in this job and join a higher group. 

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 

Hürmüz Hanım altmış beş yaşında üç çocuk annesi.  12 yıldır Tupperware  yapıyor.  Hürmüz Hanım ilk önceleri sadece bir Tupperware  kullanıcısıdır.  Sürekli  kendine ve çocuklarına Tupperware  alıyor.  Daha sonra bir arkadaşının sen de Tupperware üye ol ürünleri daha uyguna alırsın ve satış yapıp para kazanırsın uyarısı ile üye oluyor.  Satış yapmaya başlıyor.  On iki yıldır da başarılı bir şekilde bu işi yürütüyor.  Şu an da  grup başkanı ve bir çok alt üyesi var.  Bu işi yapmakdan çok memnun hem para kazanıyorum hem çeşitli gezilere katılıyorum diyor.Maya'dan aldığı kredi ile malzeme alacak.  Bu işte biraz daha ilerleyip bir üst gruba dahil olmak istiyor.

loans.use: to buy goods.

loans.name: Takdam Group

texts.en:
Sadu Chiru village is known as a tourist destination with the gift of nature of the swiftly flowing waterfall in Manipur. Its magnificent nature attracts people and charms them with its beauty. Many people from different places visit the site every day for relaxation and enjoyment with family and friends. 

The featured borrower of this group, Jangneikim, with her hand raised, runs a variety stall and sells eatables in this place. She’s an active woman, who earns her income from selling eatables in this tourist spot. The items in her stall include potato chips, juices, sweets, bakery products, etc. People buy these eatables and she earns a small profit. She used to close her stall early in the evening since there is no power supply. After availing a solar energy loan, she runs her stall for extra hours after sunset with the help of the current supply from the solar battery. She makes extra income compared to the time when she was unable to open her stall after sunset.

Jangneikim is very happy with this loan that makes a difference in her business life and improves her earnings. She says, “God be with you, WSDS.”

loans.use: To buy a mini solar lighting system to use in her shop after dusk.

loans.name: Rene Antonio

texts.es: René de 26 años de edad es un hombre tenaz, que habita junto a su esposa y sus 3 hijos de 8, 7 y 2 años de edad en vivienda propia. Él se desempeña desde hace mucho tiempo como jornalero en una finca cercana a su cantón, en la cual a su vez trabaja su esposa. René desea aprovechar la oportunidad de instalar energía eléctrica en su vivienda con su grupo de vecinos ya que en todo su cantón la instalaran, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI esperando contar con el lo antes posible para invertir en: alambre, interruptores y caja térmica, además deberá pagar mano de obra necesaria para la instalación de energía eléctrica en su vivienda.
texts.en:
